title: British workers could be forced to negotiate with 'AI robots' to get a pay rise
text:
British workers hoping for a pay rise could soon be asked to negotiate with artificially intelligent robots.

An AI chatbot that has been designed to barter with employees is being offered to companies by Estonian firm, Pactum.

The idea is that the robot can find the best deal for both parties by taking into consideration factors such as holidays, benefits and job title.

It creators claim that it can’t be influenced by gender, ethnicity, age or social class – and it could prove to be far less stressful than negotiating with a human.

description: British workers hoping for a pay rise could soon be asked to negotiate with artificially intelligent robots.
